thread.title: Jake Nicklin
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Jake Nicklin

author: Jake Nicklin
title: Jake Nicklin
text: The car was picked up around 7:30, but the garage called and made sure I was in. I was informed of what needing doing and the cost of the repairs seemed reasonable. The garage actually managed to get the car back to us earlier than expected. The payment process was really easy and straight forward. I will definitely use this service again and have already recommended it to others.
